name: AS_CO_UT_recordSafeLink
description: Generic safe link to a record
sail_code:
/* This should eventually be replaced entirely by AS_CO_UT_recordLink in interfaces */
rule!AS_CO_UT_safeLink(
  label: ri!label,
  uri: rule!AS_CO_UT_urlForRecord(
    recordType: ri!recordType,
    recordId: ri!recordId,
    siteWebAddressIdentifier: ri!siteWebAddressIdentifier,
    sitePage: ri!sitePage
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  includeRichTextIcon: ri!includeRichTextIcon,
  style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!style, 
    replacementValue: "STRONG"
  ),
  color: ri!color,
  linkStyle: ri!linkStyle
)
